mapper.sql: id, conversion_code, order_num, order_details_id, shopping_cart_id, product_id, conversion_state, create_date, update_date, member_id
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from product_conversion_code
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into product_conversion_code
id,
conversion_code,
order_num,
order_details_id,
shopping_cart_id,
product_id,
conversion_state,
create_date,
update_date,
member_id,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{conversionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orderDetailsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{shoppingCartId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{conversionState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{memberId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
update product_conversion_code
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
conversion_code = #{record.conversionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_num = #{record.orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_details_id = #{record.orderDetailsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shopping_cart_id = #{record.shoppingCartId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
product_id = #{record.productId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
conversion_state = #{record.conversionState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{record.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
member_id = #{record.memberId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

update product_conversion_code set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, conversion_code = #{record.conversionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_num = #{record.orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_details_id = #{record.orderDetailsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shopping_cart_id = #{record.shoppingCartId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, product_id = #{record.productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, conversion_state = #{record.conversionState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{record.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, member_id = #{record.memberId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update product_conversion_code
conversion_code = #{conversionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_details_id = #{orderDetailsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shopping_cart_id = #{shoppingCartId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
conversion_state = #{conversionState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT pcc.id, pcc.conversion_code, m.id "members.id", m.name "members.name", m.sex "members.sex", m.open_id "members.openId", m.phone "members.phone", m.local_token "members.localToken" FROM product_conversion_code pcc INNER JOIN members m ON pcc.member_id=m.id WHERE pcc.order_num LIKE #{orderNum} AND pcc.product_id=#{productId}

SELECT pcc.id, pcc.conversion_state, pcc.conversion_code, p.name "product.name", p.price "product.price", p.picture_url "product.pictureUrl", p.sales "product.sales", p.summary "product.summary" FROM product_conversion_code pcc INNER JOIN product p ON p.id= pcc.product_id WHERE member_id=#{memberId} AND conversion_state =#{conversionState} ORDER BY pcc.update_date DESC

SELECT pcc.id, pcc.conversion_state, pcc.conversion_code, p.name "product.name", p.price "product.price", p.picture_url "product.pictureUrl", p.sales "product.sales", p.summary "product.summary" FROM product_conversion_code pcc INNER JOIN product p ON p.id= pcc.product_id WHERE member_id=#{memberId} ORDER BY pcc.update_date DESC

SELECT pcc.id, pcc.conversion_state, pcc.conversion_code, pcc.product_id, pcc.order_num, pcc.order_details_id, pcc.shopping_cart_id, p.name "product.name", p.price "product.price", p.picture_url "product.pictureUrl", p.sales "product.sales", p.summary "product.summary" FROM product_conversion_code pcc INNER JOIN product p ON p.id=pcc.product_id WHERE pcc.id=#{id} ORDER BY pcc.update_date DESC

SELECT pcc.id, pcc.conversion_state, pcc.conversion_code, pcc.product_id, pcc.order_num, pcc.order_details_id, pcc.shopping_cart_id, p.name "product.name", p.price "product.price", p.picture_url "product.pictureUrl", p.sales "product.sales", p.summary "product.summary", m.id "members.id", m.name "members.name", m.sex "members.sex", m.open_id "members.openId", m.phone "members.phone", FROM product_conversion_code pcc LEFT OUTER JOIN product p ON p.id=pcc.product_id LEFT OUTER JOIN members m ON pcc.member_id=m.id ORDER BY pcc.update_date DESC
